paper_abstract: In this paper, we compare two generalized cyclotomic binary sequences with length 2p(2) in terms of the linear complexity. One classical sequence is defined using the method introduced by Ding and Helleseth, while the other modified sequence is defined in a slightly different manner. We show that the modified sequence has linear complexity of 2p(2), which is higher than that of the classical one.
paper_title: On the Linear Complexity of Generalized Cyclotomic Binary Sequences with Length 2p(2)
